name: Klika
description:
Klika.ba is a software development company located in Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina offering outstanding outsourcing and consulting services (big data, cloud based solutions, enterprise solutions, mobile development, UI/UX, branding and web design).
We are fully functional agile and scrum-driven team able to do almost any type of project and are able to grow our team according to our client needs. We can formalize project requirements and a vision into a working product.
